scripts.server:dev: nodemon --watch src --watch package.json --watch tsconfig.js --delay 1 --exec 'npm run lint && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env CERT_DIR=/home/youn/ cross-env WEB_ROOT=../web-dist ts-node' src/index.ts
scripts.server:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env CERT_DIR=/home/youn/ cross-env WEB_ROOT=../web-dist ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.build: npm run vue:build && npm run server:build && cp -r web-dist/ dist/public && cp package.json dist
